articles.title: June's strawberry moon will light up the sky this week - CNN
articles.description: June's full moon, the strawberry moon, will illuminate the sky this week. It gets its name from indigenous peoples and is a reminder of the short period of time when strawberries are ripe and ready to be gathered.
